message.content:
cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.SY

The paper discusses building fast computing machines for Bayesian inference, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of neural networks (cs.NE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), and systems and control (cs.SY). The paper specifically mentions applications in depth and motion perception, perceptual learning, and causal reasoning, which are all related to computer vision and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.NE, cs.AI, and cs.LG, followed by cs.CV and cs.SY.
